text:
Ruston is the parish seat of Lincoln Parish, Louisiana, United States. Ruston is the Principal city of the Ruston micropolitan area which includes all the Lincoln and Jackson Parishes.
Geography.
Ruston is located at (32.529674, -92.640466) and has an elevation of.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of, of which, of it is land and of it (0.44%) is water.
